content: *a twist on the classic ribbed sock with simple lines of garter stitch that extend from the cuff to the toe this pattern will show beautifully in a variety of sock yarns from semi-solid to wild stripes and speckles and everything in between * **materials ** approximately 380-420yds/347-400m sock yarn *sample shown in the yarns of rhichard devrieze thede colourway carnival * 2 25mm 32 circular needle magic loop method or 4 2 25mm dpns *or size required to obtain gauge * two 2 stitch markers tapestry needle **gauge ** 36sts and 52 rnds = 4 /10cm *stockinette stitch* **sizes ** *circumference* small 7 /17 1cm medium 7 25 /18 4cm large 7 75 /19 7cm **skill level** easy-intermediate *this pattern has been tech edited and test knit *
